div.head: 心頭瀁瀁欲吐
div.div: a floating sensation on top of the heart and an urge to vomit

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Xin tou yang yang yu tu

entry.def: a floating sensation on top of the heart and an urge to vomit

sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of unrest in the stomach region with an urge to vomit. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry jing li 荊瀝：飲之，去心悶煩熱，頭風旋運目眩，心頭瀁 瀁欲吐，卒失音 , “Consumed as a drink it removes heart-pressure and vexation heat, head wind, vertigo and dizziness, and a floating sensation on top of the heart and an urge to vomit , as well as sudden loss of one’s voice”.
